metadata.title: CVE-2022-4025 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Paint in Google Chrome prior to98.0.4758.80 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data outside aniframe via a crafted HTML page. (Chrome security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
